sentences.en: an old enemy of her father
sentences.cn: 她父亲的一个宿敌

sentences.en: Cats and dogs have always been natural enemies.
sentences.cn: 猫和狗向来是天敌。

sentences.en: Enemy forces lobbed a series of artillery shells onto the city.
sentences.cn: 敌军对该城发起连串炮轰。

sentences.en: He probes the enemy's weak positions, ignoring his strongholds.
sentences.cn: 他侦察敌人兵力薄弱的位置，对其要塞不予理睬。

sentences.en: He searched the skies for enemy bombers.
sentences.cn: 他在空中搜寻敌军轰炸机。

sentences.en: He was forced to turn for aid to his former enemy.
sentences.cn: 他曾被迫向以前的敌人求助。

sentences.en: He was sent to Eritrea to reconnoitre the enemy position.
sentences.cn: 他被派往厄立特里亚侦察敌军位置。

sentences.en: He was the most relentless enemy I have ever known.
sentences.cn: 他是我所遇到的最不屈不挠的敌手。

sentences.en: I wouldn’t wish this on my worst enemy.
sentences.cn: 即使是我的死对头，我也不愿看到他发生这样的事情。

sentences.en: I wouldn’t wishthis on my worst enemy.
sentences.cn: 即使是我的死对头，我也不愿看到他发生这样的事情。

sentences.en: In a naval battle your aim is to sink the enemy's ship.
sentences.cn: 在海战中目标就是击沉敌船。

sentences.en: It could engage the enemy beyond the range of hostile torpedoes.
sentences.cn: 从这可以避开敌方鱼雷区对敌人发动进攻。

sentences.en: Mr Brownson, I assure you King's an old enemy of mine.
sentences.cn: 布朗森先生，我向你保证金是我的老冤家。

sentences.en: She’s a dangerous enemy to have.
sentences.cn: 与她为敌很危险。

sentences.en: The enemy must be digging themselves in now ready for the attack.
sentences.cn: 敌人现在一定在挖掩体，准备迎接进攻。

sentences.en: The enemy opened fire at a range of only 20 yards.
sentences.cn: 敌人在距离仅20码的地方开火了。

sentences.en: The enemy seemed stunned by the suddenness of the attack.
sentences.cn: 进攻之出其不意似乎让敌人大吃一惊。

sentences.en: The President spoke of the treacherous intentions of the enemy.
sentences.cn: 总统谈及了敌人的奸诈用心。

sentences.en: the unforgettable sight of the president shaking hands with his sworn enemy
sentences.cn: 董事长与其死敌握手的难忘情景

sentences.en: This is something of a grudge match against a long-term enemy.
sentences.cn: 这可以说是一场与宿敌你死我活的比赛。

sentences.en: When war broke out, he was interned as an enemy alien.
sentences.cn: 战争爆发时，他作为敌国人士遭到关押。

trans.tran_en: someone who hates you and wants to harm you
